OOC: hehehe your character looks like one of mine before reestart, 
even the name is almost the same: Najah who had instead legs a snake 
tail, he was pretty thin, huncback, human torso and snake-like face.

????::

"How nice!!!"replied sarcastic the bot"But I'm not the intruder, this 
is my hunt fields and I had been here before this thing was built 
here... well the last time that I hunted here was 6 months ago*. But 
I'm not willing to fight now, who're you?"




* OOC: Before tripeds arrived
